languages.text: "Легкой смерти он не заслужил. Отдай его своим блюстителям для тренировки палаческого ремесла".
"He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."
languages.original_text: "Легкой смерти он не заслужил. Отдай его своим блюстителям для тренировки палаческого ремесла".

traits.locale_text: "He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."
"He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."
"He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."
"He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."
"He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."
"He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."

languages.text: «No se merece una muerte rápida. Entrégueselo a su personal de seguridad, que lo usen de muñeco de prácticas para las ejecuciones».
languages.original_text: "He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."

traits.locale_text: «No se merece una muerte rápida. Entrégueselo a su personal de seguridad, que lo usen de muñeco de prácticas para las ejecuciones».

languages.text: 「生やさしい死では足りない。その男をエンフォーサーに引き渡して、死刑執行人の訓練相手にするんだ」
languages.original_text: "He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."

traits.locale_text: 「生やさしい死では足りない。その男をエンフォーサーに引き渡して、死刑執行人の訓練相手にするんだ」

languages.text: “不能让这个人死得这么痛快。把他交给你的执法者，让他们拿他好好练练手。”
languages.original_text: "He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."

traits.locale_text: “不能让这个人死得这么痛快。把他交给你的执法者，让他们拿他好好练练手。”

languages.text: "Er verdient keinen leichten Tod. Überlasst ihn Euren Enforcern als Trainingsobjekt für ihre Exekutionen."
languages.original_text: "He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."

traits.locale_text: "Er verdient keinen leichten Tod. Überlasst ihn Euren Enforcern als Trainingsobjekt für ihre Exekutionen."

languages.text: « Il ne mérite pas une mort miséricordieuse. Livrez-le à nos prévôts pour qu'ils s'exercent au métier d'exécuteur. »
languages.original_text: "He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."

traits.locale_text: « Il ne mérite pas une mort miséricordieuse. Livrez-le à nos prévôts pour qu'ils s'exercent au métier d'exécuteur. »

languages.text: "Kolay bir ölümü hak etmiyor. Onu infazcılara verin. Cellatlık marifetlerini geliştirmede faydalansınlar."
languages.original_text: "He does not deserve an easy death. Give him to your enforcers for training in the executioner's craft."
